alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 8:22PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A GUST FRONT WILL AFFECT NORTH CENTRAL DOUGLAS...EAST CENTRAL CHELAN AND CENTRAL OKANOGAN COUNTIES... At 821 PM PDT, radar indicated a gust front located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Oroville to 15 miles west of Okanogan to near Bridgeport. Movement was west at 30 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with these storms. Winds may result in a brief visibility reduction from blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Chelan, Okanogan, Bridgeport, Brewster, Oroville, Tonasket, Twisp, Pateros, Winthrop, Conconully, Nice Campground, Flat Campground, Cordell, Poplar Flat Campground, Mystery Campground, Loup Loup Campground, Andrews Creek Campground, Falls Creek Campground, Monse, and Salmon Meadows Campground. This includes U.S. Highway 97 in Washington between mile markers 236 and 286, and between mile markers 301 and 332.
